data.actual_result: Only available option in the Filter User field is "All"
data.expected_result: Filter User list shows the users from the server you're seeing the logs
data.short_description: Audit Logs user filter inexistent if you are in another server
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server - Right Click a server where you can see the audit logs - Navigate to Sever Settings > Audit Logs
